title: [CVE-2019-11840] Nancy is reporting vulnerable dependencies
body:
# Summary
[Nancy](https://github.com/sonatype-nexus-community/nancy) has been showing vulnerability alerts when scanning my projects.

Version: github.com/rs/zerolog v1.20.0

# How to reproduce
 ```
 go list -m all | nancy sleuth 
 
pkg:golang/golang.org/x/crypto@0.0.0-20190308221718-c2843e01d9a2
1 known vulnerabilities affecting installed version 

 [CVE-2019-11840]  Use of Insufficiently Random Values  
 Link for more info https://ossindex.sonatype.org/vuln/5121f5ff-9831-44a6-af2e-24f7301d1df7?component-type=golang&component-name=golang.org%2Fx%2Fcrypto&utm_source=nancy-client&utm_medium=integration&utm_content=1.0.9 
 ```
This is a dependency used by  `golang.org/x/tools`.
 
# Possible fixes
 
 I've seen this issue when I was looking for solutions: https://github.com/rs/zerolog/issues/182 
 It seems to me that https://github.com/rs/zerolog/pull/183 has not completely solved the problem.
 
 I've tried to update `golang.org/x/tools` to `v0.1.0`, and the scan passed without errors.
 
 ```
  go list -m all | nancy sleuth                                        
┏━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┓
┃ Summary                      ┃
┣━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┳━━━━┫
┃ Audited Dependencies    ┃ 12 ┃
┣━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━╋━━━━┫
┃ Vulnerable Dependencies ┃ 0  ┃
┗━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┻━━━━┛
```

 Is it possible to update golang.org/x/tools?

I can open a PR with this change if you prefer.
